segments.text: Good morning , Mr Bell . How are you today ? Are you here to sort out your L / C documents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've been through them and there's a problem , a rather major discrepancy actually . You see ? It should be KN509 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , here it says KM509 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly , if we accept these it could cause a lot of problems in our record and our accounts system because the numbers don't match .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I see what you mean . You need to reject these documents .
segments.speaker: S1
